name: Are You Your Own Enemy?
description:
Are You Your Own Enemy?  is a 2D platformer game where users can create player as a path. The user has to reach and open the door in order to finish the current level and proceed to the next one. Currently, there are only four levels.

The game controls are as follows:

  • Arrow Keys or A/D: Move
  • W/Up Arrow/Space: Jump
  • C: Create Player As A Path
  • E: Open Doors
  • R: Restart Level
  • P/Escape: Pauses
